headline: GOP leaders in Ohio try to block Trump endorsement of Vance
author: Associated Press
sentences:
By JILL COLVIN and JULIE CARR SMYTH
COLUMBUS — Dozens of Republican leaders in Ohio are mounting a last-minute effort to urge former President Donald Trump not to endorse “Hillbilly Elegy” author JD Vance in the crowded upcoming primary for an open Senate seat.
A draft letter circulating among Republicans and obtained by The Associated Press calls on Trump to remain neutral in the race.
It was written following a news report that Trump was going to ...
